content: I’m currently an AI Algorithm Engineer. Previously, I was a Research Fellow at the NTU AI Center and Research Assistant supervised by Prof. Chu-Song Chen at the Institute of Information Science (IIS), Academia Sinica.

title: Jia-Hong Lee (Henry)

summary: Object detection, Clothes detection, Face detection and Face recognition using `Pytorch` and `Tensorflow`. We cooperated with [NADI SYSTEM CORP](http://www.nadi3docms.com/NADIWeb/) in 2019.
title: IVCLab Deep Learning Toolkit
